price: او هغوى به له سمې لارې ايساروي خو هغوى به انګېري چې لار موندونكي دي.
arabic: وَإِنَّهُمۡ لَيَصُدُّونَهُمۡ عَنِ ٱلسَّبِيلِ وَيَحۡسَبُونَ أَنَّهُم مُّهۡتَدُونَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: wa-innahum layaṣuddūnahum ʿani al-sabīli wayaḥsabūna annahum muh'tadūna
